text: The 1997 HEW Cyclassics was the second edition of the HEW Cyclassics cycle race and was held on 10 August 1997. The race started and finished in Hamburg. The race was won by Jan Ullrich. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 9" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 24" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 32" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 43" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 43" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 43" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 43" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 43" |} |} ==References== 1997 Category:1997 in German sport Hew Cyclassics Category:August 1997 sports events in Europe
